message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a standout in its category, and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I propose a special introductory price of $180 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to own something truly special at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.
